content: This game is quite enjoyable. The background story begins to slowly unfold as you make your way through further areas, and actions you've taken previously do come back to bite or help you. This fragments the plot a little. Also, the background images don't always match up with the written description of the fight. A fight outdoors could be backed by the image of a toilet, or a battle inside an apartment could show a generic outdoors scene.
